title: HAUTE - sans display font - ID
content:
Looking for an ID on this pretty inline display font used for the HAUTE logo

Many thanks for any help in advance,  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131143000im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202015-01-21%20at%203_4558.59.08%20PM.png)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2015-01-21 at 3.59.08 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131143000/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202015-01-21%20at%203.59.08%20PM.png) | 271 KB |
author: Danny_Miller

comments.content:
Peignot Bold filled with white and stroked with black, then converted to outlines:  
 [http://www.linotype.com/1328/Peignot-family.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131143000/http:/www.linotype.com/1328/Peignot-family.html "http://www.linotype.com/1328/Peignot-family.html")

It could be a modified **[Peignot (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131143000/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Peignot%20LT%20-%20Bold&fid=643350ee7b9a5ad90a49f262ed926f39&fsize=60&text=HAUTE&fit=1)**

PS: Too late :)
